          text run at (0,0) width 772: "Colgroups are used to identify column groups. In this test case, the COLGROUP element is used in conjunction with the"
          text run at (0,18) width 725: "SPAN attribute. The table below has two distinct column groups; 'Airport Location' and 'Car Rental Information'."
